org.cleverbus.api.asynch
Class AsynchRouteBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.cleverbus.api.asynch.AsynchRouteBuilder

public final class AsynchRouteBuilder
extends Object

Helper class for creating input route for asynch. messages.

Create new instance with calling newInstance(ServiceExtEnum, String, String, AsynchResponseProcessor, DataFormatDefinition) method, sets parameters and finally call build(RouteBuilder) method for creating route definition.

Author:
Petr Juza, Tomas Hanus
